actions.name: Slaying Longbow
actions.description: If target has 100 HP or fewer, DC 15 CON save or die.

actions.name: Flying Sword
actions.description: Releases greatsword to hover within 5 ft.; as bonus action command to fly up to 50 ft. to attack or return. If targeted, solar counts as holding it; falls if solar dies.

actions.name: Healing Touch (4/Day)
actions.description: Touches a creature to restore 40 (8d8+4) HP and end any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

legendaryActions.name: Teleport
legendaryActions.description: Teleports with equipment up to 120 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendaryActions.name: Searing Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: Each creature of choice in 10-ft. radius makes DC 23 DEX save, taking 14 (4d6) fire plus 14 (4d6) radiant on fail, half on success.

legendaryActions.name: Blinding Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: Creature within 30 ft. that can see solar makes DC 15 CON save or is blinded until cured (e.g., lesser restoration).
